register.reg_long_name: Interrupt Controller Interrupt Group 0 Enable register

purpose_text.para: Controls whether Group 0 interrupts are enabled or not.

field_description.para: Virtual accesses to this register update ICH_VMCR_EL2.VENG0.
If the highest priority pending interrupt for that PE is a Group 0 interrupt using 1 of N model, then the interrupt will be targeted to another PE as a result of the Enable bit changing from 1 to 0.
